title: Divya Muktavali Jhumkas: A Symphony of Tradition and Sparkle
materials: and vibrant Emerald gemstones. Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting
features: Intricate filigree design reminiscent of Mughal architecture. The jhumka's bell shape is handcrafted with floral motifs and meticulously placed Cubic Zirconia for a captivating sparkle. The cascading pearls add a touch of sophistication and movement. The crown of the jhumka features a peacock-inspired design with Emerald and Ruby accents, a quintessential South Indian motif.
colors: Predominantly gold with dazzling white Cubic Zirconia
complemented by the vibrant green of Emeralds
the rich red of the Ruby
and the soft luster of the pearls.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham or half-saree function. Also suitable for modern celebrations where you want to add a touch of ethnic elegance.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary appeal. The 22K gold ensures lasting value and a rich, warm glow. The intricate craftsmanship and high-quality materials make this piece a treasured heirloom. The use of Cubic Zirconia provides a brilliant alternative to diamonds, offering exceptional sparkle at an accessible price point. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty, prosperity, and good fortune.
